50 const uint8_t ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DEGREE = 2;
51 
55 const uint8_t ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS = 3;
56 
60 const bool ReconstructionPolynomial::ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS = true;
61 
65 const int ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE = 10;
66 
70 const std::vector<std::vector<uint16_t>> ReconstructionPolynomial::m_countCoefficientCache = generateCountCoefficientCache();
71 
76 const std::vector<std::vector<uint16_t>> ReconstructionPolynomial::m_countDegreeCoefficientCache = generateCountDegreeCoefficientCache();
77 
81 std::vector<std::vector<uint16_t>> ReconstructionPolynomial::generateCountCoefficientCache()
82 {
83  std::vector<std::vector<uint16_t>> cache(MAX_DIMENSIONS + 1, std::vector<uint16_t>(MAX_DEGREE + 1, 0));
84  for (uint8_t dimensions = 0; dimensions <= MAX_DIMENSIONS; ++dimensions) {
85  for (uint8_t degree = 0; degree <= MAX_DEGREE; ++degree) {
86  cache[dimensions][degree] = countCoefficients(degree, dimensions);
87  }
88  }
89 
90  return cache;
91 }
92 
97 std::vector<std::vector<uint16_t>> ReconstructionPolynomial::generateCountDegreeCoefficientCache()
98 {
99  std::vector<std::vector<uint16_t>> cache(MAX_DIMENSIONS + 1, std::vector<uint16_t>(MAX_DEGREE + 1, 0));
100  for (uint8_t dimensions = 0; dimensions <= MAX_DIMENSIONS; ++dimensions) {
101  for (uint8_t degree = 0; degree <= MAX_DEGREE; ++degree) {
102  cache[dimensions][degree] = countDegreeCoefficients(degree, dimensions);
103  }
104  }
105 
106  return cache;
107 }
108 
118 uint16_t ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions)
119 {
120  assert(degree <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DEGREE);
121  assert(dimensions <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS);
122 
123  return m_countCoefficientCache[dimensions][degree];
124 }
125 
134 const std::vector<uint16_t> & ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientsCount(uint8_t dimensions)
135 {
136  assert(dimensions <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS);
137 
138  return m_countCoefficientCache[dimensions];
139 }
140 
150 uint16_t ReconstructionPolynomial::countCoefficients(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions)
151 {
152  uint16_t nCoeffs = 0;
153  for (int i = 0; i <= degree; ++i) {
154  nCoeffs += countDegreeCoefficients(i, dimensions);
155  }
156 
157  return nCoeffs;
158 }
159 
169 uint16_t ReconstructionPolynomial::getDegreeCoefficientCount(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions)
170 {
171  assert(degree <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DEGREE);
172  assert(dimensions <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS);
173 
174  return m_countDegreeCoefficientCache[dimensions][degree];
175 }
176 
185 const std::vector<uint16_t> & ReconstructionPolynomial::getDegreeCoefficientsCount(uint8_t dimensions)
186 {
187  assert(dimensions <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS);
188 
189  return m_countDegreeCoefficientCache[dimensions];
190 }
191 
201 uint16_t ReconstructionPolynomial::countDegreeCoefficients(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions)
202 {
203  if (dimensions == 0) {
204  return 0;
205  }
206 
207  return (utils::factorial(dimensions - 1 + degree) / utils::factorial(dimensions - 1) / utils::factorial(degree));
208 }
209 
220 void ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisValues(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions, const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
221  const std::array<double, 3> &point, double *csi)
222 {
223  // Set 0-th degree coefficients
224  csi[0] = 1.;
225 
226  // Set high degree coefficients
227  if (degree >= 1) {
228  int offset = 1;
229  const std::array<double, 3> distance = point - origin;
230 
231  // Set 1-st degree coefficients
232  for (int i = 0; i < dimensions; ++i) {
233  csi[offset++] = distance[i];
234  }
235 
236  // Set 2-nd degree coefficients
237  if (degree >= 2) {
238  for (int i = 0; i < dimensions; ++i) {
239  csi[offset++] = 0.5 * distance[i] * distance[i];
240  }
241 
242  if (dimensions >= 2) {
243  csi[offset++] = distance[0] * distance[1];
244 
245  if (dimensions >= 3) {
246  csi[offset++] = distance[0] * distance[2];
247  csi[offset++] = distance[1] * distance[2];
248  }
249  }
250  }
251 
252  // Check if all coefficients have been set
253  assert(offset == ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, dimensions));
254  }
255 }
256 
269 void ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions, const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
270  const std::array<double, 3> &point, const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
271  double *dcsi)
272 {
273  // Set 0-th degree coefficients
274  dcsi[0] = 0.;
275 
276  // Set high degree coefficients
277  if (degree >= 1) {
278  int offset = 1;
279 
280  // Set 1-st degree coefficients
281  for (int i = 0; i < dimensions; ++i) {
282  dcsi[offset++] = direction[i];
283  }
284 
285  // Set 2-nd degree coefficients
286  if (degree >= 2) {
287  const std::array<double, 3> distance = point - origin;
288 
289  for (int i = 0; i < dimensions; ++i) {
290  dcsi[offset++] = distance[i] * direction[i];
291  }
292 
293  if (dimensions >= 2) {
294  dcsi[offset++] = distance[0] * direction[1] + distance[1] * direction[0];
295 
296  if (dimensions >= 3) {
297  dcsi[offset++] = distance[0] * direction[2] + distance[2] * direction[0];
298  dcsi[offset++] = distance[1] * direction[2] + distance[2] * direction[1];
299  }
300  }
301  }
302 
303  // Check if all coefficients have been set
304  assert(offset == ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, dimensions));
305  }
306 }
307 
321 void ReconstructionPolynomial::evalCellBasisValues(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions, const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
322  const Cell &cell, const std::array<double, 3> *vertexCoords,
323  double *csi)
324 {
325  // Check if cell type is supported
326  ElementType cellType = cell.getType();
327 
328  bool cellTypeSupported = false;
329  if (cellType == ElementType::PIXEL) {
330  cellTypeSupported = true;
331  } else if (cellType == ElementType::VOXEL) {
332  cellTypeSupported = true;
333  }
334 
335  if (!cellTypeSupported) {
336  throw std::runtime_error("Cell type not supported.");
337  }
338 
339  // Set 0-th degree coefficients
340  csi[0] = 1.;
341 
342  // Set high degree coefficients
343  if (degree >= 1) {
344  int offset = 1;
345  const std::array<double, 3> distance = cell.evalCentroid(vertexCoords) - origin;
346 
347  // Set 1-st degree coefficients
348  for (int i = 0; i < dimensions; ++i) {
349  csi[offset++] = distance[i];
350  }
351 
352  // Set 2-nd degree coefficients
353  if (degree >= 2) {
354  double cellSize = cell.evalSize(vertexCoords);
355 
356  for (int i = 0; i < dimensions; ++i) {
357  csi[offset++] = 0.5 * (distance[i] * distance[i] + cellSize * cellSize / 12.);
358  }
359 
360  if (dimensions >= 2) {
361  csi[offset++] = distance[0] * distance[1];
362 
363  if (dimensions >= 3) {
364  csi[offset++] = distance[0] * distance[2];
365  csi[offset++] = distance[1] * distance[2];
366  }
367  }
368  }
369 
370  // Check if all coefficients have been set
371  assert(offset == ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, dimensions));
372  }
373 }
374 
378 ReconstructionPolynomial::ReconstructionPolynomial()
379  : m_degree(0), m_dimensions(0), m_nFields(0), m_nCoeffs(0)
380 {
381  initialize(0, 0, {{0., 0., 0.}}, 0);
382 }
383 
391 ReconstructionPolynomial::ReconstructionPolynomial(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions,
392  const std::array<double, 3> &origin, int nFields)
393  : m_degree(0), m_dimensions(0), m_nFields(0), m_nCoeffs(0)
394 {
395  initialize(degree, dimensions, origin, nFields);
396 }
397 
404 ReconstructionPolynomial::ReconstructionPolynomial(const ReconstructionPolynomial &other)
405  : ReconstructionPolynomial(other.getDegree(), other.getDimensions(), other.m_origin, other.m_nFields)
406 {
407  if (m_nFields > 0) {
408  int nWeights = m_nCoeffs * m_nFields;
409  std::copy(other.m_coeffs.get(), other.m_coeffs.get() + nWeights, m_coeffs.get());
410  }
411 }
412 
419 ReconstructionPolynomial & ReconstructionPolynomial::operator=(const ReconstructionPolynomial &other)
420 {
421  ReconstructionPolynomial tmp(other);
422  swap(tmp);
423 
424  return *this;
425 }
426 
434 void ReconstructionPolynomial::swap(ReconstructionPolynomial &other) noexcept
435 {
436  std::swap(other.m_degree, m_degree);
437  std::swap(other.m_dimensions, m_dimensions);
438  std::swap(other.m_nCoeffs, m_nCoeffs);
439  std::swap(other.m_nFields, m_nFields);
440  std::swap(other.m_coeffs, m_coeffs);
441  std::swap(other.m_origin, m_origin);
442 }
443 
455 void ReconstructionPolynomial::initialize(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions,
456  const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
457  int nFields, bool release)
458 {
459  assert(degree <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DEGREE);
460  m_degree = degree;
461 
462  assert(dimensions <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS);
463  m_dimensions = dimensions;
464 
465  int currentStorageSize = m_nCoeffs;
466 
467  m_nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(m_degree, m_dimensions);
468 
469  if (nFields > 0) {
470  m_nFields = nFields;
471 
472  int storageSize = m_nCoeffs * m_nFields;
473 
474  bool reallocate;
475  if (release) {
476  reallocate = (currentStorageSize != storageSize);
477  } else {
478  reallocate = (currentStorageSize < storageSize);
479  }
480 
481  if (reallocate) {
482  m_coeffs = std::unique_ptr<double[]>(new double[storageSize]);
483  }
484  } else {
485  clear(release);
486  }
487 
488  m_origin = origin;
489 }
490 
497 void ReconstructionPolynomial::clear(bool release)
498 {
499  m_nFields = 0;
500 
501  if (release) {
502  m_coeffs.reset();
503  }
504 }

633 std::size_t ReconstructionPolynomial::computeFieldCoefficientsOffset(uint8_t degree, int field) const
634 {
635  std::size_t offset = field * getFieldCoefficientsStride() + degree;
636 
637  return offset;
638 }
639 
649 std::size_t ReconstructionPolynomial::getFieldCoefficientsStride() const
650 {
651  return m_nCoeffs;
652 }

741 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeValues(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
742  int nFields, double *values) const
743 {

746 
756 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeValues(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
757  int nFields, int offset, double *values) const
758 {
759  assert(degree <= getDegree());
760 
761  // Early return if there are no field to process
762  if (nFields == 0) {
763  return;
764  }
765 
766  // Get values
767  const std::size_t fieldValuesStride = 1;
768  double *fieldValue = values;
769  const double *fieldValueEnd = fieldValue + fieldValuesStride * nFields;
770 
771  // Get coefficients
772  std::size_t fieldCoeffsStride = getFieldCoefficientsStride();
773  const double *fieldCoeffs = m_coeffs.get() + fieldCoeffsStride * offset;
774 
775  // Constant polynomial
776  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 0) {
777  do {
778  *fieldValue = fieldCoeffs[0];
779 
780  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
781  fieldValue += fieldValuesStride;
782  } while (fieldValue != fieldValueEnd);
783 
784  return;
785  }
786 
787  // Generic polynomial
788  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, m_dimensions);
789 
790  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(csi, double, nCoeffs, MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
791  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisValues(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, csi);
792 
793  do {
794  *fieldValue = fieldCoeffs[0] * csi[0];
795  for (int i = 1; i < nCoeffs; ++i) {
796  *fieldValue += fieldCoeffs[i] * csi[i];
797  }
798 
799  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
800  fieldValue += fieldValuesStride;
801  } while (fieldValue != fieldValueEnd);
802 }
803

818  const double *limiters, int field,
819  double *values) const
820 {
821  computeValuesLimited(m_degree, point, limiters, 1, field, values);
822 }

961 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeValuesLimited(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
962  const double *limiters, int nFields, int offset,
963  double *values) const
964 {
965  assert(degree <= getDegree());
966 
967  // Early return if there are no field to process
968  if (nFields == 0) {
969  return;
970  }
971 
972  // Get values
973  std::size_t fieldValuesStride = 1;
974  double *fieldValue = values;
975  double *fieldValueEnd = fieldValue + fieldValuesStride * nFields;
976 
977  // Get coefficients
978  std::size_t fieldCoeffsStride = getFieldCoefficientsStride();
979  const double *fieldCoeffs = m_coeffs.get() + fieldCoeffsStride * offset;
980 
981  // Constant polynomial
982  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 0) {
983  do {
984  *fieldValue = fieldCoeffs[0];
985 
986  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
987  fieldValue += fieldValuesStride;
988  } while (fieldValue != fieldValueEnd);
989 
990  return;
991  }
992 
993  // Get limiters
994  std::size_t fieldLimitersStride = degree;
995  const double *fieldLimiters = limiters;
996 
997  // Generic polynomial
998  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, m_dimensions);
999  const std::vector<uint16_t> &nDegreeCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getDegreeCoefficientsCount(m_dimensions);
1000 
1001  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(csi, double, nCoeffs, MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
1002  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisValues(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, csi);
1003 
1004  do {
1005  // Degree 0
1006  *fieldValue = fieldCoeffs[0] * csi[0];
1007 
1008  // Degrees greater than 0
1009  int coeffEnd = nDegreeCoeffs[0];
1010  for (int n = 1; n <= degree; ++n) {
1011  int coeffBegin = coeffEnd;
1012  coeffEnd = coeffBegin + nDegreeCoeffs[n];
1013 
1014  double fieldDegreeValue = 0;
1015  for (int i = coeffBegin; i < coeffEnd; ++i) {
1016  fieldDegreeValue += fieldCoeffs[i] * csi[i];
1017  }
1018 
1019  *fieldValue += fieldDegreeValue * fieldLimiters[n - 1];
1020  }
1021 
1022  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1023  fieldValue += fieldValuesStride;
1024  fieldLimiters += fieldLimitersStride;
1025  } while (fieldValue != fieldValueEnd);
1026 }

1118 
1128 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeDerivatives(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
1129  const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
1130  int nFields, double *derivatives) const
1131 {
1132  computeDerivatives(degree, point, direction, nFields, 0, derivatives);
1133 }
1134 
1145 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeDerivatives(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
1146  const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
1147  int nFields, int offset, double *derivatives) const
1148 {
1149  assert(degree <= getDegree());
1150 
1151  // Early return if there are no field to process
1152  if (nFields == 0) {
1153  return;
1154  }
1155 
1156  // Get derivatives
1157  std::size_t fieldDerivativeStride = 1;
1158  double *fieldDerivative = derivatives;
1159  double *fieldDerivativeEnd = fieldDerivative + fieldDerivativeStride * nFields;
1160 
1161  // Constant polynomial
1162  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 0) {
1163  do {
1164  *fieldDerivative = 0.;
1165 
1166  fieldDerivative += fieldDerivativeStride;
1167  } while (fieldDerivative != fieldDerivativeEnd);
1168 
1169  return;
1170  }
1171 
1172  // Get coefficients
1173  std::size_t fieldCoeffsStride = getFieldCoefficientsStride();
1174  const double *fieldCoeffs = m_coeffs.get() + fieldCoeffsStride * offset;
1175 
1176  // Linear polynomial
1177  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 1) {
1178  do {
1179  *fieldDerivative = fieldCoeffs[1] * direction[0];
1180  for (int d = 1; d < m_dimensions; ++d) {
1181  *fieldDerivative += fieldCoeffs[d + 1] * direction[d];
1182  }
1183 
1184  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1185  fieldDerivative += fieldDerivativeStride;
1186  } while (fieldDerivative != fieldDerivativeEnd);
1187 
1188  return;
1189  }
1190 
1191  // Generic polynomial
1192  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, m_dimensions);
1193  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(csi, double, nCoeffs, MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
1194  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, direction, csi);
1195 
1196  do {
1197  *fieldDerivative = fieldCoeffs[0] * csi[0];
1198  for (int i = 1; i < nCoeffs; ++i) {
1199  *fieldDerivative += fieldCoeffs[i] * csi[i];
1200  }
1201 
1202  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1203  fieldDerivative += fieldDerivativeStride;
1204  } while (fieldDerivative != fieldDerivativeEnd);
1205 }
1206 
1221 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeDerivativeLimited(const std::array<double, 3> &point,
1222  const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
1223  const double *limiters, int field,
1224  double *derivative) const
1225 {
1226  computeDerivativesLimited(m_degree, point, direction, limiters, 1, field, derivative);
1227 }

1243  const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
1244  const double *limiters,
1245  double *derivatives) const
1246 {
1247  computeDerivativesLimited(m_degree, point, direction, limiters, m_nFields, 0, derivatives);
1248 }

1333  const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
1334  const double *limiters,
1335  double *derivatives) const

1355 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeDerivativesLimited(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
1356  const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
1357  const double *limiters, int nFields,
1358  double *derivatives) const
1359 {
1360  computeDerivativesLimited(degree, point, direction, limiters, nFields, 0, derivatives);
1361 }
1362 
1379 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeDerivativesLimited(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
1380  const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
1381  const double *limiters, int nFields, int offset,
1382  double *derivatives) const
1383 {
1384  assert(degree <= getDegree());
1385 
1386  // Early return if there are no field to process
1387  if (nFields == 0) {
1388  return;
1389  }
1390 
1391  // Get derivatives
1392  std::size_t fieldDerivativeStride = 1;
1393  double *fieldDerivative = derivatives;
1394  double *fieldDerivativeEnd = fieldDerivative + fieldDerivativeStride * nFields;
1395 
1396  // Constant polynomial
1397  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 0) {
1398  do {
1399  *fieldDerivative = 0.;
1400 
1401  fieldDerivative += fieldDerivativeStride;
1402  } while (fieldDerivative != fieldDerivativeEnd);
1403 
1404  return;
1405  }
1406 
1407  // Get coefficients
1408  std::size_t fieldCoeffsStride = getFieldCoefficientsStride();
1409  const double *fieldCoeffs = m_coeffs.get() + fieldCoeffsStride * offset;
1410 
1411  // Get limiters
1412  std::size_t fieldLimitersStride = degree;
1413  const double *fieldLimiters = limiters;
1414 
1415  // Linear polynomial
1416  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 1) {
1417  do {
1418  *fieldDerivative = fieldCoeffs[1] * direction[0];
1419  for (int d = 1; d < m_dimensions; ++d) {
1420  *fieldDerivative += fieldCoeffs[d + 1] * direction[d];
1421  }
1422 
1423  *fieldDerivative *= fieldLimiters[0];
1424 
1425  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1426  fieldDerivative += fieldDerivativeStride;
1427  fieldLimiters += fieldLimitersStride;
1428  } while (fieldDerivative != fieldDerivativeEnd);
1429 
1430  return;
1431  }
1432 
1433  // Generic polynomial
1434  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, m_dimensions);
1435  const std::vector<uint16_t> &nDegreeCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getDegreeCoefficientsCount(m_dimensions);
1436 
1437  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(dcsi, double, nCoeffs, MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
1438  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, direction, dcsi);
1439 
1440  do {
1441  *fieldDerivative = fieldCoeffs[0] * dcsi[0];
1442 
1443  int coeffEnd = nDegreeCoeffs[0];
1444  for (int n = 1; n <= degree; ++n) {
1445  int coeffBegin = coeffEnd;
1446  coeffEnd = coeffBegin + nDegreeCoeffs[n];
1447 
1448  double fieldDegreeDerivative = 0;
1449  for (int i = coeffBegin; i < coeffEnd; ++i) {
1450  fieldDegreeDerivative += fieldCoeffs[i] * dcsi[i];
1451  }
1452 
1453  *fieldDerivative += fieldLimiters[n - 1] * fieldDegreeDerivative;
1454  }
1455 
1456  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1457  fieldDerivative += fieldDerivativeStride;
1458  fieldLimiters += fieldLimitersStride;
1459  } while (fieldDerivative != fieldDerivativeEnd);
1460 }
1461

1555 
1565 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeGradients(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
1566  int nFields, int offset,
1567  std::array<double, 3> *gradients) const
1568 {
1569  assert(degree <= getDegree());
1570 
1571  // Early return if there are no field to process
1572  if (nFields == 0) {
1573  return;
1574  }
1575 
1576  // Get gradients
1577  const std::size_t fieldGradientStride = 1;
1578  std::array<double, 3> *fieldGradient = gradients;
1579  const std::array<double, 3> *fieldGradientEnd = fieldGradient + fieldGradientStride * nFields;
1580 
1581  // Constant polynomial
1582  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 0) {
1583  do {
1584  *fieldGradient = {{0., 0., 0.}};
1585 
1586  fieldGradient += fieldGradientStride;
1587  } while (fieldGradient != fieldGradientEnd);
1588 
1589  return;
1590  }
1591 
1592  // Get coefficients
1593  const std::size_t fieldCoeffsStride = getFieldCoefficientsStride();
1594  const double *fieldCoeffs = m_coeffs.get() + fieldCoeffsStride * offset;
1595 
1596  // Linear polynomial
1597  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 1) {
1598  do {
1599  // Evaluate gradients
1600  for (int d = 0; d < m_dimensions; ++d) {
1601  (*fieldGradient)[d] = fieldCoeffs[1 + d];
1602  }
1603 
1604  // Explicitly zero unused components
1605  for (int d = m_dimensions; d < ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS; ++d) {
1606  (*fieldGradient)[d] = 0.;
1607  }
1608 
1609  // Advance to the next field
1610  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1611  fieldGradient += fieldGradientStride;
1612  } while (fieldGradient != fieldGradientEnd);
1613 
1614  return;
1615  }
1616 
1617  // Generic polynomial
1618  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, m_dimensions);
1619 
1620  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(dcsi, double, static_cast<std::size_t>(m_dimensions * nCoeffs), 3 * MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
1621  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, {{1., 0., 0.}}, dcsi);
1622  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, {{0., 1., 0.}}, dcsi + nCoeffs);
1623  if (m_dimensions == 3) {
1624  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, {{0., 0., 1.}}, dcsi + 2 * nCoeffs);
1625  }
1626 
1627  do {
1628  // Evaluate gradient
1629  for (int d = 0; d < m_dimensions; ++d) {
1630  const double *dcsi_dimension = dcsi + d * nCoeffs;
1631 
1632  (*fieldGradient)[d] = fieldCoeffs[0] * dcsi_dimension[0];
1633  for (int i = 1; i < nCoeffs; ++i) {
1634  (*fieldGradient)[d] += fieldCoeffs[i] * dcsi_dimension[i];
1635  }
1636  }
1637 
1638  // Explicitly zero unused components
1639  for (int d = m_dimensions; d < ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS; ++d) {
1640  (*fieldGradient)[d] = 0.;
1641  }
1642 
1643  // Advance to the next field
1644  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1645  fieldGradient += fieldGradientStride;
1646  } while (fieldGradient != fieldGradientEnd);
1647 }
1648 
1662 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeGradientLimited(const std::array<double, 3> &point,
1663  const double *limiters, int field,
1664  std::array<double, 3> *gradient) const
1665 {
1666  computeGradientsLimited(m_degree, point, limiters, 1, field, gradient);
1667 }

1806 void ReconstructionPolynomial::computeGradientsLimited(int degree, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
1807  const double *limiters, int nFields, int offset,
1808  std::array<double, 3> *gradients) const
1809 {
1810  assert(degree <= getDegree());
1811 
1812  // Early return if there are no field to process
1813  if (nFields == 0) {
1814  return;
1815  }
1816 
1817  // Get gradients
1818  const std::size_t fieldGradientStride = 1;
1819  std::array<double, 3> *fieldGradient = gradients;
1820  const std::array<double, 3> *fieldGradientEnd = fieldGradient + fieldGradientStride * nFields;
1821 
1822  // Constant polynomial
1823  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 0) {
1824  do {
1825  *fieldGradient = {{0., 0., 0.}};
1826 
1827  fieldGradient += fieldGradientStride;
1828  } while (fieldGradient != fieldGradientEnd);
1829 
1830  return;
1831  }
1832 
1833  // Get coefficients
1834  const std::size_t fieldCoeffsStride = getFieldCoefficientsStride();
1835  const double *fieldCoeffs = m_coeffs.get() + fieldCoeffsStride * offset;
1836 
1837  // Get limiters
1838  const std::size_t fieldLimitersStride = degree;
1839  const double *fieldLimiters = limiters;
1840 
1841  // Linear polynomial
1842  if (ENABLE_FAST_PATH_OPTIMIZATIONS && degree == 1) {
1843  do {
1844  // Evaluate gradients
1845  for (int d = 0; d < m_dimensions; ++d) {
1846  (*fieldGradient)[d] = fieldLimiters[0] * fieldCoeffs[1 + d];
1847  }
1848 
1849  // Explicitly zero unused components
1850  for (int d = m_dimensions; d < ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS; ++d) {
1851  (*fieldGradient)[d] = 0.;
1852  }
1853 
1854  // Advance to the next field
1855  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1856  fieldGradient += fieldGradientStride;
1857  fieldLimiters += fieldLimitersStride;
1858  } while (fieldGradient != fieldGradientEnd);
1859 
1860  return;
1861  }
1862 
1863  // Generic polynomial
1864  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, m_dimensions);
1865  const std::vector<uint16_t> &nDegreeCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getDegreeCoefficientsCount(m_dimensions);
1866 
1867  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(dcsi, double, static_cast<std::size_t>(m_dimensions * nCoeffs), 3 * MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
1868  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, {{1., 0., 0.}}, dcsi);
1869  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, {{0., 1., 0.}}, dcsi + nCoeffs);
1870  if (m_dimensions == 3) {
1871  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, m_dimensions, m_origin, point, {{0., 0., 1.}}, dcsi + 2 * nCoeffs);
1872  }
1873 
1874  do {
1875  // Evaluate gradients
1876  for (int d = 0; d < m_dimensions; ++d) {
1877  const double *dcsi_dimension = dcsi + d * nCoeffs;
1878 
1879  (*fieldGradient)[d] = fieldCoeffs[0] * dcsi_dimension[0];
1880  }
1881 
1882  int coeffEnd = nDegreeCoeffs[0];
1883  for (int n = 1; n <= degree; ++n) {
1884  double fieldsLimiter = fieldLimiters[n - 1];
1885 
1886  int coeffBegin = coeffEnd;
1887  coeffEnd = coeffBegin + nDegreeCoeffs[n];
1888  for (int i = coeffBegin; i < coeffEnd; ++i) {
1889  for (int d = 0; d < m_dimensions; ++d) {
1890  const double *dcsi_dimension = dcsi + d * nCoeffs;
1891 
1892  (*fieldGradient)[d] += fieldsLimiter * fieldCoeffs[i] * dcsi_dimension[i];
1893  }
1894  }
1895  }
1896 
1897  // Explicitly zero unused components
1898  for (int d = m_dimensions; d < ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS; ++d) {
1899  (*fieldGradient)[d] = 0.;
1900  }
1901 
1902  // Advance to the next field
1903  fieldCoeffs += fieldCoeffsStride;
1904  fieldGradient += fieldGradientStride;
1905  fieldLimiters += fieldLimitersStride;
1906  } while (fieldGradient != fieldGradientEnd);
1907 }
1908 
1914 void ReconstructionPolynomial::display(std::ostream &out) const
1915 {
1916  uint8_t dimensions = getDimensions();
1917 
1918  for (int k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
1919  out << " field " << k << "\n";
1920  for (int i = 0; i <= m_degree; ++i) {
1921  out << " degree = " << i << " : " ;
1922 
1923  uint16_t nDegreeCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getDegreeCoefficientCount(i, dimensions);
1924  const double *degreeCoeffs = getDegreeCoefficients(i, k);
1925  for (int n = 0; n < nDegreeCoeffs; ++n) {
1926  out << degreeCoeffs[n];
1927  if (n != nDegreeCoeffs - 1) {
1928  out << " , ";
1929  }
1930  }
1931 
1932  out << "\n";
1933  }
1934  }
1935 }
1936 
1948 const int ReconstructionKernel::MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE = 10;
1949 
1953 ReconstructionKernel::ReconstructionKernel()
1954  : m_nEquations(0), m_nCoeffs(0), m_degree(0), m_dimensions(0)
1955 {
1956  initialize(0, 0, 0);
1957 }
1958 
1966 ReconstructionKernel::ReconstructionKernel(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions, int nEquations)
1967  : m_nEquations(0), m_nCoeffs(0), m_degree(0), m_dimensions(0)
1968 {
1969  initialize(degree, dimensions, nEquations);
1970 }
1971 
1978 ReconstructionKernel::ReconstructionKernel(const ReconstructionKernel &other)
1979  : ReconstructionKernel(other.getDegree(), other.getDimensions(), other.m_nEquations)
1980 {
1981  if (m_nEquations > 0) {
1982  int nWeights = m_nCoeffs * m_nEquations;
1983  std::copy(other.m_weights.get(), other.m_weights.get() + nWeights, m_weights.get());
1984  }
1985 }
1986 
1993 ReconstructionKernel & ReconstructionKernel::operator=(const ReconstructionKernel &other)
1994 {
1995  ReconstructionKernel tmp(other);
1996  swap(tmp);
1997 
1998  return *this;
1999 }
2000 
2008 void ReconstructionKernel::swap(ReconstructionKernel &other) noexcept
2009 {
2010  std::swap(other.m_degree, m_degree);
2011  std::swap(other.m_dimensions, m_dimensions);
2012  std::swap(other.m_nCoeffs, m_nCoeffs);
2013  std::swap(other.m_nEquations, m_nEquations);
2014  std::swap(other.m_weights, m_weights);
2015 }
2016 
2027 void ReconstructionKernel::initialize(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions, int nEquations, bool release)
2028 {
2029  assert(degree <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DEGREE);
2030  m_degree = degree;
2031 
2032  assert(dimensions <= ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS);
2033  m_dimensions = dimensions;
2034 
2035  int currentStorageSize = m_nCoeffs * m_nEquations;
2036 
2037  m_nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(m_degree, m_dimensions);
2038  m_nEquations = nEquations;
2039 
2040  int storageSize = m_nCoeffs * m_nEquations;
2041 
2042  bool reallocate;
2043  if (release) {
2044  reallocate = (currentStorageSize != storageSize);
2045  } else {
2046  reallocate = (currentStorageSize < storageSize);
2047  }
2048 
2049  if (reallocate) {
2050  m_weights = std::unique_ptr<double[]>(new double[storageSize]);
2051  }
2052 }

2291 void ReconstructionKernel::updatePolynomial(uint8_t degree, const double *values,
2292  ReconstructionPolynomial *polynomial) const
2293 {
2294  assert(degree <= getDegree());
2295 
2296  uint8_t dimensions = getDimensions();
2297 
2298  int nEquations = getEquationCount();
2299  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, dimensions);
2300 
2301  cblas_dgemv(CBLAS_ORDER::CblasColMajor, CBLAS_TRANSPOSE::CblasTrans,
2302  nEquations, nCoeffs, 1., getPolynomialWeights(), nEquations,
2303  values, 1, 0, polynomial->getCoefficients(), 1);
2304 }
2305 
2326 void ReconstructionKernel::updatePolynomial(uint8_t degree, int nFields, const double **values,
2327  ReconstructionPolynomial *polynomial) const
2328 {
2329  assert(degree <= getDegree());
2330 
2331  uint8_t dimensions = getDimensions();
2332 
2333  int nEquations = getEquationCount();
2334  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, dimensions);
2335 
2336  const double *weights = m_weights.get();
2337  double *coeffs = polynomial->getCoefficients();
2338  for (int k = 0; k < nFields; ++k) {
2339  double *fieldCoeffs = coeffs + polynomial->computeFieldCoefficientsOffset(0, k);
2340 
2341  const double *weight = weights;
2342  for (int i = 0; i < nCoeffs; ++i) {
2343  fieldCoeffs[i] = *weight * values[0][k];
2344  ++weight;
2345 
2346  for (int j = 1; j < nEquations; ++j) {
2347  fieldCoeffs[i] += *weight * values[j][k];
2348  ++weight;
2349  }
2350  }
2351  }
2352 }
2353

2449 void ReconstructionKernel::computeValueLimitedWeights(uint8_t degree, const std::array<double, 3> &origin, const std::array<double, 3> &point,
2450  const double *limiters, double *valueWeights) const
2451 {
2452  assert(degree <= getDegree());
2453 
2454  uint8_t dimensions = getDimensions();
2455 
2456  int nEquations = getEquationCount();
2457  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, dimensions);
2458 
2459  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(csi, double, nCoeffs, MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
2460 
2461  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisValues(degree, dimensions, origin, point, csi);
2462  if (limiters) {
2463  applyLimiter(degree, limiters, csi);
2464  }
2465 
2466  cblas_dgemv(CBLAS_ORDER::CblasColMajor, CBLAS_TRANSPOSE::CblasNoTrans,
2467  nEquations, nCoeffs, 1., getPolynomialWeights(), nEquations,
2468  csi, 1, 0, valueWeights, 1);
2469 }

2580 void ReconstructionKernel::computeDerivativeLimitedWeights(uint8_t degree, const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
2581  const std::array<double, 3> &point, const std::array<double, 3> &direction,
2582  const double *limiters,
2583  double *derivativeWeights) const
2584 {
2585  assert(degree <= getDegree());
2586 
2587  uint8_t dimensions = getDimensions();
2588 
2589  int nEquations = getEquationCount();
2590  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, dimensions);
2591 
2592  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(dcsi, double, nCoeffs, MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
2593 
2594  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, dimensions, origin, point, direction, dcsi);
2595  if (limiters) {
2596  applyLimiter(degree, limiters, dcsi);
2597  }
2598 
2599  cblas_dgemv(CBLAS_ORDER::CblasColMajor, CBLAS_TRANSPOSE::CblasNoTrans,
2600  nEquations, nCoeffs, 1., getPolynomialWeights(), nEquations,
2601  dcsi, 1, 0, derivativeWeights, 1);
2602 }

2644  const std::array<double, 3> &point,

2670 void ReconstructionKernel::computeGradientLimitedWeights(const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
2671  const std::array<double, 3> &point, const double *limiters,
2672  std::array<double, 3> *gradientWeights) const
2673 {
2674  computeGradientLimitedWeights(getDegree(), origin, point, limiters, gradientWeights);
2675 }
2676 
2701 void ReconstructionKernel::computeGradientLimitedWeights(uint8_t degree, const std::array<double, 3> &origin,
2702  const std::array<double, 3> &point, const double *limiters,
2703  std::array<double, 3> *gradientWeights) const
2704 {
2705  assert(degree <= getDegree());
2706 
2707  uint8_t dimensions = getDimensions();
2708 
2709  int nEquations = getEquationCount();
2710  int nCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getCoefficientCount(degree, dimensions);
2711 
2712  BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(dcsi, double, nCoeffs, MAX_STACK_WORKSPACE_SIZE);
2713 
2714  const double *polynomialWeights = getPolynomialWeights();
2715 
2716  std::array<double, 3> direction = {{0., 0., 0.}};
2717  for (int d = 0; d < dimensions; ++d) {
2718  direction[d] = 1.;
2719 
2720  ReconstructionPolynomial::evalPointBasisDerivatives(degree, dimensions, origin, point, direction, dcsi);
2721  if (limiters) {
2722  applyLimiter(degree, limiters, dcsi);
2723  }
2724 
2725  // Weights are stored in contiguous three-dimensional arrays, this
2726  // means we can access the weights of the current dimensions using
2727  // the dimension as offset and a stride of three elements
2728  cblas_dgemv(CBLAS_ORDER::CblasColMajor, CBLAS_TRANSPOSE::CblasNoTrans,
2729  nEquations, nCoeffs, 1., polynomialWeights, nEquations,
2730  dcsi, 1, 0, gradientWeights->data() + d, 3);
2731 
2732  direction[d] = 0.;
2733  }
2734 
2735  // Explicitly zero unused components
2736  if (dimensions != ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS) {
2737  for (int i = 0; i < nEquations; ++i) {
2738  for (int d = dimensions; d < ReconstructionPolynomial::MAX_DIMENSIONS; ++d) {
2739  gradientWeights[i][d] = 0.;
2740  }
2741  }
2742  }
2743 }
2744 
2757 void ReconstructionKernel::applyLimiter(uint8_t degree, const double *limiters, double *coeffs) const
2758 {
2759  if (degree < 1) {
2760  return;
2761  }
2762 
2763  uint8_t dimensions = getDimensions();
2764  const std::vector<uint16_t> &nDegreeCoeffs = ReconstructionPolynomial::getDegreeCoefficientsCount(dimensions);
2765 
2766  int coeffEnd = nDegreeCoeffs[0];
2767  for (int n = 1; n <= degree; ++n) {
2768  double limiterScaleFactor = limiters[n - 1];
2769 
2770  int coeffBegin = coeffEnd;
2771  coeffEnd = coeffBegin + nDegreeCoeffs[n];
2772  for (int k = coeffBegin; k < coeffEnd; ++k) {
2773  coeffs[k] *= limiterScaleFactor;
2774  }
2775  }
2776 }
2777 
2785 void ReconstructionKernel::display(std::ostream &out, double tolerance) const
2786 {
2787  int nCoeffs = getCoefficientCount();
2788  for (int i = 0; i < nCoeffs; ++i) {
2789  out << i << " ";
2790  for (int j = 0; j < m_nEquations; ++j) {
2791  double weigth = m_weights[linearalgebra::linearIndexColMajor(j, i, m_nEquations, m_nCoeffs)];
2792  if (std::abs(weigth) < tolerance) {
2793  continue;
2794  }
2795 
2796  out << "(" << j << "," << weigth << ") ";
2797  }
2798 
2799  out << std::endl;
2800  }
2801 }

2889 void ReconstructionAssembler::clear(bool release)
2890 {

2892  m_leastSquaresOrder.clear();
2893  m_leastSquaresScaleFactors.clear();
2894 
2895  m_A.clear();
2896  m_C.clear();
2897 
2898  m_sigma.clear();
2899  m_U.clear();
2900  m_S.clear();
2901  m_Vt.clear();
2902  m_SVDWorkspace.resize(1);
2903  m_w.clear();

2906  m_constraintsOrder.shrink_to_fit();
2907  m_leastSquaresOrder.shrink_to_fit();
2908  m_leastSquaresScaleFactors.shrink_to_fit();
2909 
2910  m_A.shrink_to_fit();
2911  m_C.shrink_to_fit();
2912 
2913  m_sigma.shrink_to_fit();
2914  m_U.shrink_to_fit();
2915  m_S.shrink_to_fit();
2916  m_Vt.shrink_to_fit();
2917  m_SVDWorkspace.shrink_to_fit();
2918  m_w.shrink_to_fit();
2919  }
2920 }

3040 
3047 double * ReconstructionAssembler::_addEquation(ReconstructionType type, double scaleFactor)
3048 {
3049  // Update equation information
3050  int nEquations = countEquations();
3051  switch (type) {
3052 
3053  case TYPE_CONSTRAINT:
3054  m_constraintsOrder.emplace_back(nEquations);
3055  break;
3056 
3057  case TYPE_LEAST_SQUARE:
3058  m_leastSquaresOrder.emplace_back(nEquations);
3059  m_leastSquaresScaleFactors.emplace_back(scaleFactor);
3060  break;
3061 
3062  }
3063 
3064  // Prepare storage for equation coefficients
3065  int nCoeffs = getCoefficientCount();
3066 
3067  double *equationCoeffsStorage = nullptr;
3068  switch (type) {
3069 
3070  case TYPE_CONSTRAINT:
3071  m_C.resize(m_C.size() + nCoeffs);
3072  equationCoeffsStorage = m_C.data() + m_C.size() - nCoeffs;
3073  break;
3074 
3075  case TYPE_LEAST_SQUARE:
3076  m_A.resize(m_A.size() + nCoeffs);
3077  equationCoeffsStorage = m_A.data() + m_A.size() - nCoeffs;
3078  break;
3079 
3080  }
3081 
3082  return equationCoeffsStorage;
3083 }
3084 
3093 void ReconstructionAssembler::assembleKernel(ReconstructionKernel *kernel) const
3094 {
3095  // Initialize reconstruciton kernel
3096  uint8_t degree = getDegree();
3097  uint8_t dimensions = getDimensions();
3098 
3099  int nEquations = countEquations();
3100 
3101  kernel->initialize(degree, dimensions, nEquations, true);
3102 
3103  // Update the kernel
3104  updateKernel(kernel);
3105 }
3106 
3114 void ReconstructionAssembler::updateKernel(ReconstructionKernel *kernel) const
3115 {
3116  // Get the number of equations
3117  int nConstraints = countConstraints();
3118  int nLeastSquares = countLeastSquares();
3119  int nEquations = countEquations();
3120 
3121  // Get the number of polynomial coefficients
3122  int nCoeffs = getCoefficientCount();
3123 
3124  // Evaluate normalized least square scale factors
3125  if (nLeastSquares > 0) {
3126  double maxLeastSquareScaleFactor = std::abs(m_leastSquaresScaleFactors[0]);
3127  for (int k = 1; k < nLeastSquares; ++k) {
3128  maxLeastSquareScaleFactor = std::max(std::abs(m_leastSquaresScaleFactors[k]), maxLeastSquareScaleFactor);
3129  }
3130 
3131  m_w.resize(nLeastSquares);
3132  for (int k = 0; k < nLeastSquares; ++k) {
3133  m_w[k] = m_leastSquaresScaleFactors[k] / maxLeastSquareScaleFactor;
3134  }
3135  }
3136 
3137  // The linear-constrained are introduced in the least-squares problem
3138  // through Lagrange multipliers. The resulting linear system is:
3139  //
3140  // | A^t A w C^t | |x | = |A^t w b|
3141  // | C 0 | |lambda| |d |
3142  //
3143  // with A and C the least-squares and costraints equations respectively,
3144  // and b and d their corresponding RHSs. x are the coefficients of
3145  // the polynomial and lambda the lagrange multipliers. w are the normalized
3146  // east square scale factors.
3147  //
3148  // This system is denoted by S:
3149  //
3150  // | x | |A^t w 0| |b|
3151  // |S| | | = | | | |
3152  // |lambda| |0 I| |d|
3153  //
3154  // The matrices S and S^-1 are symmetric and only the upper portions are
3155  // computed
3156  int nUnknowns = nCoeffs + nConstraints;
3157 
3158  m_S.resize(nUnknowns * nUnknowns);
3159  for (int i = 0; i < nCoeffs; ++i) {
3160  for (int j = i; j < nCoeffs; ++j) {
3161  // Compute A^t A on the fly
3162  double ATA_ij = 0.;
3163  for (int k = 0; k < nLeastSquares; ++k) {
3164  int A_ki_idx = linearalgebra::linearIndexRowMajor(k, i, nLeastSquares, nCoeffs);
3165  int A_kj_idx = linearalgebra::linearIndexRowMajor(k, j, nLeastSquares, nCoeffs);
3166  ATA_ij += m_A[A_ki_idx] * m_A[A_kj_idx] * m_w[k];
3167  }
3168 
3169  int l = linearalgebra::linearIndexColMajor(i, j, nUnknowns, nUnknowns);
3170  m_S[l] = ATA_ij;
3171 
3172  int m = linearalgebra::linearIndexColMajor(j, i, nUnknowns, nUnknowns);
3173  m_S[m] = ATA_ij;
3174  }
3175 
3176  for (int j = nCoeffs; j < nUnknowns; ++j) {
3177  int l = linearalgebra::linearIndexColMajor(i, j, nUnknowns, nUnknowns);
3178  int C_idx = linearalgebra::linearIndexRowMajor(j - nCoeffs, i, nConstraints, nCoeffs);
3179  m_S[l] = m_C[C_idx];
3180 
3181  int m = linearalgebra::linearIndexColMajor(j, i, nUnknowns, nUnknowns);
3182  m_S[m] = m_S[l];
3183  }
3184  }
3185 
3186  // Compute inverse S matrix
3187  // Since S may me be rank-deficit (eg if not enough neighbours are available)
3188  // the pseudo-inverse is used. This corresponds of computing the least-norm
3189  // solution of the problem.
3190  computePseudoInverse(nUnknowns, nUnknowns, SVD_ZERO_THRESHOLD, m_S.data());
3191 
3192  // Weights needed to evaluate the polynomial coefficients come from the
3193  // following equation:
3194  //
3195  // | x | |A^t w 0| |b| |b|
3196  // | | = S^-1 | | | | = S^-1 Q | |
3197  // |lambda| |0 I| |d| |d|
3198  //
3199  // Since we are interested only in x (the polynomial coefficients) only
3200  // the first nCoeffs rows of the matrix S^-1 Q are computed. Those values
3201  // are the polynomial weights.
3202  //
3203  // Weigths are stored according the order in which the equations have been
3204  // added.
3205  double *weights = kernel->getPolynomialWeights();
3206  for (int i = 0; i < nCoeffs; ++i) {
3207  for (int j = 0; j < nEquations; ++j) {
3208  double value = 0;
3209  for (int k = 0; k < nUnknowns; ++k) {
3210  int l = linearalgebra::linearIndexColMajorSymmetric(i, k, nUnknowns, nUnknowns, 'U');
3211  if (k < nCoeffs && j < nLeastSquares) {
3212  int A_jk_idx = linearalgebra::linearIndexRowMajor(j, k, nLeastSquares, nCoeffs);
3213  value += m_S[l] * m_A[A_jk_idx] * m_w[j];
3214  } else if ((k - nCoeffs) == (j - nLeastSquares)) {
3215  value += m_S[l];
3216  }
3217  }
3218 
3219  int equation;
3220  if (j < nLeastSquares) {
3221  equation = m_leastSquaresOrder[j];
3222  } else {
3223  equation = m_constraintsOrder[j - nLeastSquares];
3224  }
3225 
3226  int weightLineraIndex = linearalgebra::linearIndexColMajor(equation, i, nEquations, nCoeffs);
3227  weights[weightLineraIndex] = value;
3228  }
3229  }
3230 }
3244 void ReconstructionAssembler::computePseudoInverse(int m, int n, double zeroThreshold, double *A) const
3245 {
3246  // Compute SVD
3247  //
3248  // A = U * Sigma * Vt (Equation 21)
3249  int k = std::min(m,n);
3250 
3251  m_sigma.resize(k);
3252  m_U.resize(m * k);
3253  m_Vt.resize(k * n);
3254 
3255  char jobU = 'S';
3256  char jobVT = 'S';
3257 
3258  int workspaceSize = -1;
3259 
3260  int info;
3261 
3262  LAPACK_dgesvd(&jobU, &jobVT, &m, &n, A, &m, m_sigma.data(), m_U.data(), &m, m_Vt.data(), &k,
3263  m_SVDWorkspace.data(), &workspaceSize, &info);
3264 
3265  workspaceSize = m_SVDWorkspace[0];
3266  if (workspaceSize > (int) m_SVDWorkspace.size()) {
3267  m_SVDWorkspace.resize(workspaceSize);
3268  }
3269 
3270  LAPACK_dgesvd(&jobU, &jobVT, &m, &n, A, &m, m_sigma.data(), m_U.data(), &m, m_Vt.data(), &k,
3271  m_SVDWorkspace.data(), &workspaceSize, &info);
3272 
3273  if (info > 0) {
3274  log::cout() << "SVD failed in ReconstructionAssembler::computePseudoInverse()" <<std::endl;
3275  exit(1);
3276  }
3277 
3278  // Inv(A) = V * Sigma^ + *U^T (Equation 22)
3279  //
3280  // u = sigma^ + *U
3281  // and is stored in U
3282  for (int i = 0; i < k; ++i) {
3283  double sigma_plus = (m_sigma[i] > zeroThreshold) ? (1. / m_sigma[i]) : m_sigma[i];
3284  cblas_dscal(m, sigma_plus, &m_U[i*m], 1);
3285  }
3286 
3287  // Inv(A) = (Vt)^T * u^T
3288  cblas_dgemm(CBLAS_ORDER::CblasColMajor, CBLAS_TRANSPOSE::CblasTrans, CBLAS_TRANSPOSE::CblasTrans,
3289  n, m, k, 1., m_Vt.data(), k, m_U.data(), m, 0., A, n);
3290 }
3291

3309 }

3351  }
3352 }

3359 void Reconstruction::assemble()
3360 {
3361  if (ReconstructionKernel::getEquationCount() != ReconstructionAssembler::countEquations()) {
3362  ReconstructionAssembler::assembleKernel(this);
3363  } else {
3364  ReconstructionAssembler::updateKernel(this);
3365  }
3366 }
3367 
3368 }
